page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: A survey of 60 adults in our area gave the following results when asked what worried them most about the area in which they live. The points are noted in order of frequency. 1. Poor condition of housing. 2. Vandalism. 3. Poor policing of area. 4. House break-ins. 5. Lack of public amenities. 6. Rubbish and litter. 7. Gypsies/tinkers. 8. Pollution from Elkington's factory. 9. Sray dogs. 10. Poor condition of roads. 11. Canal. 12. Violence after dark. 13. Poor bus service. 14. Lack of public telephones.
